sentence: Arizona Senate President Karen Fann told TGP that Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich has spoken to numerous people for his criminal investigation.

sentence: The fact remains that these right-wingers have been further enabled by the likes of Donald Trump and Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, both of whom spread the false gospel of Trump’s “Big Lie.” With the U.S. Senate’s failure to pass voting rights legislation earlier this year, the voting rights fight has come to Arizona.

title: Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich's election fraud investigation turns up bupkis

sentence: Attorney General Mark Brnovich’s probe of Maricopa County’s 2020 election thus far has found “serious vulnerabilities” in procedures but no crimes, according to an initial report released Wednesday on the monthslong investigation.

title: Attorney general's report on election in Maricopa County questions procedures, doesn't allege wrongdoing

sentence: Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich released a report citing “serious vulnerabilities that must be addressed and raise questions about the 2020 election in Arizona.” Indeed, the report issued to the state Senate highlighted controversial management of the election in Maricopa County.

title: Arizona AG: ‘Serious Vulnerabilities’ in Maricopa County ‘Raise Questions’ About 2020 Election
